channel.title: Let me get this straight?
channel.description:
ok so i am wandering what [code]command.substring(1,2,3,4,5,6,etc))[/code] is i think i have a little bit ii just dont know if its right What i think:
Substring(int) might be a line of code with a value that makes a java file do a specific task?
if its not please help me?

item.title: Let me get this straight?
item.dc:creator: @lukenuke75 lukenuke75
item.description:
@lukenuke75 wrote:

[quote=“silabgarza, post:2, topic:308626”]basicly, it ignores the first part of the command, and reads everything ever

example:
command.substring(4);
::yell hi
thats wat makes it show up
“yell” = 4 letters[/quote]

Whaaa-aaaa-aaaaa-aaaat? lol

Read full topic
